plot: A time in the not so distant future, four unlikely heroes are brought together through a series of loss and brutality. betrayed by the government who once promised them safety and well being.
title: WW4: Rise and Fall of the New World Order
plot_es: A time in the not so distant future, four unlikely heroes are brought together through a series of loss and brutality. betrayed by the government who once promised them safety and well being.
original_name: WW4: Rise and Fall of the New World Order
plot_en: A time in the not so distant future, four unlikely heroes are brought together through a series of loss and brutality. betrayed by the government who once promised them safety and well being.
